name: styr
description: Electron app with React and TypeScript

scripts.dev: yarn build:preload && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn dev:vite" "yarn dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--import=tsx electron --no-sandbox src/main.ts
scripts.build:electron: tsc src/main.ts --outDir dist --module ESNext --target ESNext --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop --allowImportingTsExtensions false --skipLibCheck true && tsc src/preload.ts --outDir dist --module CommonJS --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck true
scripts.build:preload: tsc src/preload.ts --outDir dist --module CommonJS --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck true
